unit_description: base metric unit of weight; 1000 grams = 1 kilogram
base metric unit of volume; 1 liter = 1000 milliliters
1 calorie = 4.184 joules (not commonly used alone in food)
1 kilocalorie = 1000 calories = food energy unit (often just called "calorie")
varies by substance; e.g.1 IU Vitamin D = 0.025 µg cholecalciferol
% of recommended daily intake based on a 2000-calorie diet
